Title: End conflict to honour Pope, Vatican diplomat tells South Sudan
Description: The Vatican's representative to South Sudan says the Pope's memory should be honoured by seeking peace.

Title: Federal work shaped a Black middle class. Now it's destabilized by Trump's job cuts
Description:
For generations of Black workers, federal government jobs have provided a path into the middle class.
The Trump administration's workforce cuts are now throwing that sense of stability up in the air.

Title: From dogs to rabbits, NPR readers share how adopting shelter pets impacted them
Description:
National Adopt a Shelter Pet Day is on April 30.
To bring awareness to the day, the Up First newsletter is sharing some stories from readers about how their pet has impacted their lives.

Title: What the new gold rush means for you
Description: In this Sunday edition of BI Today, we're talking about gold's hot streak, private-equity recruiting, and frozen pizza.

Title: I'm a federal contractor trying to get out of government work. I'm worried my entire education and career will be worthless.
Description:
A federal contractor wonders if they'll be the next government worker to lose their job.
They've cut back on spending and are looking for other jobs.

Title: Rolex wouldn't service the vintage watch my mom inherited. Watchmakers say it happens all the time.
Description:
A Rolex retailer wouldn't work on my grandma's vintage watch.
Watchmakers say the company doesn't maintain the parts to fix some of its old watches.

Title: Winner! Powerball jackpot hits Saturday, April 26, at $168 million. Check your numbers
Description:

Title: Forget Dire Wolves. Here’s What We Really Need in the Fight Against Extinction
Description: The challenge with so-called de-extinction efforts is that they pull the spotlight away from one of the gravest crises on the planet.

Title: Google DeepMind CEO Demis Hassabis on AI in the Military and What AGI Could Mean for Humanity
Description: TIME spoke with Google DeepMind CEO Demis Hassabis, who was on the 2025 TIME100 list.

Description:

Title: 6 classic Motorola phones to revive after the Razr
Description:
Motorola's Razr was just one entry in an entire series of four-letter phones.
Here's 6 more Motorola should bring back.

Title: Trump wasted no time breaking his campaign promises. It's been 100 days of lies. | Opinion
Description: Trump has two simple tactics when dealing with promises he failed to keep ‒ deny the failure, or stomp away while blaming anyone but himself.

Title: DMCA Notices Can Silence Critics But Complaints By The Public Put All at Risk
Description:

Title: River v Boca - inside the world's fiercest rivalry
Description: Before Sunday's Superclasico between Argentine icons River Plate and Boca Juniors, BBC Sport tells the story of arguably football's biggest rivalry.
